short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Track and manage your binge watching.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
TrackBinge helps you track your binge time and gives you a way to build around it.
Manage your binge preferences and cruise through binge time using TrackBinge profiles.
